akn:section.akn:heading: Applicability of administrative provisions of subchapter I

akn:content.akn:p: § 1643h. Applicability of administrative provisions of subchapter I To the extent they are not inconsistent with the provisions of this subchapter, the following provisions of subchapter I of this chapter shall be applicable to this subchapter: Subsections (b), (c), (d) (e), (h), and (j) of section 1623 of this title; subsection (f) of section 1626 of this title. (Mar. 10, 1950, ch. 54, title V, § 509, as added Pub. L. 88–666, Oct. 16, 1964, 78 Stat. 1112.)
